description:
After two prior matches, Canelo Alvarez is set to fight Gennady Golovkin for a third time on September 17, 2022 at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas, NV.

If Canelo Alvarez wins his scheduled bout with Gennady Golovkin, this market will resolve to "Alvarez". If Gennady Golovkin wins his scheduled bout with Canelo Alvarez, this market will resolve to "Golovkin". 

If this fight ends in a draw, is not officially designated as a win for either Canelo Alvarez or Gennady Golovkin, is cancelled, or otherwise is not decided by or moved to a date after September 24, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to 50-50. This market may not resolve before September 17, 2022.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official reporting from the live boxing match between Canelo Alvarez and Gennady Golovkin, however a consensus of credible reporting may be used.

markets.question: Who will win Canelo Alvarez vs. Gennady Golovkin 3 on September 17?
